<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

## Description {#details}

Iterate over the pressure sets affected by the given physical or virtual register.

If Reg is physical, it must be a register unit (from <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcregunititerator">MCRegUnitIterator</a>).

Definition at line 1248 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/machineregisterinfo-h">MachineRegisterInfo.h</a>.
